dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3132 IH: To increase the amount of funding available for fiscal year 2015 for certain general business loans authorized under the Small Business Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Velázquez (for herself, Mr. Serrano, Ms. Judy Chu of California, Ms. Hahn, Mrs. Lawrence, Ms. Clarke of New York, Mr. Moulton, Mr. Takai, Ms. Meng, Ms. Adams, and Mr. Payne) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To increase the amount of funding available for fiscal year 2015 for certain general business loans authorized under the Small Business Act.

section.header: Increase to the amount of funding available to the Small Business Administration to make section 7(a) loans
section.text: The third proviso under the heading Small Business Administration—Business Loans Program Account in title V of division E of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015 (Public Law 113–235; 128 Stat. 2371) is amended by striking $18,750,000,000 and inserting $23,500,000,000.
